SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltSortMchnInfoMapper.selectFcltSortMchnInfoRawDataList */ OTI.CRTR_YR , OTI.APC_CD ,(SELECT APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD) AS APC_NM , OTI.SN , OTI.ITEM_CD , OTI.ITEM_NM
, OASM.SORT_ITEM_CD , OASM.SORT_ITEM_NM , OASM.SORT_PRCS_ABLT , OASM.SORT_PRCS_PRFMNC , OASM.SORT_OPRTNG_HR , OASM.SORT_AVG_OPRTNG_DCNT , OASM.SORT_MCHN_HOLD_YN
FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_TRMT_ITEM OTI ,TB_TE_APC_OPER_ABLT_SORT_MCHN OASM WHERE 1=1 AND OTI.APC_CD = OASM.APC_CD(+) AND OTI.CRTR_YR = OASM.CRTR_YR(+) AND OTI.SN = OASM.SN(+) AND OTI.OGNZ_SE_CD = '2' AND OTI.APC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND OTI.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND OTI.APC_CD IN (SELECT APC_CD FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CTPV = (SELECT CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
AND SGG = (SELECT SGG FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY OTI.CRTR_YR , APC_NM , OTI.SN
